mapper.update: UPDATE bim_grab.cinema_weixin SET weixin_city_name = #{weixinCityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, weixin_area = #{weixinArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city_id = #{cityId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, city_name = #{cityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, area_id = #{areaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, area_name = #{areaName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, longitude = #{longitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT id, weixin_city_name, weixin_area, city_id, city_name, area_id, area_name, name, address, latitude, longitude, tel FROM bim_grab.cinema_weixin WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT id, weixin_city_name, weixin_area, city_id, city_name, area_id, area_name, name, address, latitude, longitude, tel FROM bim_grab.cinema_weixin
